00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 #include <l4/cxx/minmax>
00023 #include <l4/cxx/basic_ostream>
00024 
00025 
00026 namespace cxx {
00027 
00028 /*
00029  * This class is used to group characters of a string which belong
00030  * to one syntactical token types number, identifier, string,
00031  * whitespace or another single character.
00032  */
00033 class String
00034 {
00035 public:
00036 
00037   typedef char const *Index;
00038 
00039   String(char const *s) throw() : _start(s), _len(__builtin_strlen(s)) {}
00040   String(char const *s, unsigned long len) throw() : _start(s), _len(len) {}
00041   String(char const *s, char const *e) throw() : _start(s), _len(e-s) {}
00042 
00043   String() : _start(0), _len(0) {}
00044 
00045   Index start() const { return _start; }
00046   Index end() const { return _start + _len; }
00047   int len() const { return _len; }
00048 
00049   void start(char const *s) { _start = s; }
00050   void len(unsigned long len) { _len = len; }
00051   bool empty() const { return !_len; }
00052 
00053   String head(Index end) const
00054   {
00055     if (end < _start)
00056       return String();
00057 
00058     if (eof(end))
00059       return *this;
00060 
00061     return String(_start, end - _start);
00062   }
00063 
00064   String head(unsigned long end) const
00065   { return head(start() + end); }
00066 
00067   String substr(unsigned long idx, unsigned long len = ~0UL) const
00068   {
00069     if (idx >= _len)
00070       return String(end(), 0UL);
00071 
00072     return String(_start + idx, cxx::min(len, _len - idx));
00073   }
00074 
00075   String substr(char const *start, unsigned long len = 0) const
00076   {
00077     if (start >= _start && !eof(start))
00078       {
00079   unsigned long nlen =_start + _len - start;
00080   if (len != 0)
00081     nlen = cxx::min(nlen, len);
00082   return String(start, nlen);
00083       }
00084 
00085     return String(end(), 0UL);
00086   }
00087 
00088   template< typename F >
00089   char const *find_match(F const &match) const
00090   {
00091     String::Index s = _start;
00092     while (1)
00093       {
00094   if (eof(s))
00095     return s;
00096 
00097   if (match(*s))
00098     return s;
00099 
00100   ++s;
00101       }
00102   }
00103 
00104   char const *find(char const *c) const
00105   { return find(c, start());  }
00106 
00107   char const *find(int c) const
00108   { return find(c, start());  }
00109 
00110   char const *rfind(char const *c) const
00111   {
00112     if (!_len)
00113       return end();
00114 
00115     char const *p = end();
00116     --p;
00117     while (p >= _start)
00118       {
00119   if (*p == *c)
00120     return p;
00121   --p;
00122       }
00123     return end();
00124 
00125   }
00126 
00127   Index starts_with(cxx::String const &c) const
00128   {
00129     unsigned long i;
00130     for (i = 0; i < c._len && i < _len; ++i)
00131       if (_start[i] != c[i])
00132   return 0;
00133     return i == c._len ? start() + i : 0;
00134   }
00135 
00136   char const *find(int c, char const *s) const
00137   {
00138     if (s<_start)
00139       return end();
00140 
00141     while (1)
00142       {
00143   if (eof(s))
00144     return s;
00145 
00146   if (*s == c)
00147     return s;
00148 
00149   ++s;
00150       }
00151   }
00152 
00153   char const *find(char const *c, char const *s) const
00154   {
00155     if (s<_start)
00156       return end();
00157 
00158     while (1)
00159       {
00160   if (eof(s))
00161     return s;
00162 
00163   for (char const *x = c; *x; ++x)
00164     if (*s == *x)
00165       return s;
00166 
00167   ++s;
00168       }
00169   }
00170 
00171   char const &operator [] (unsigned long idx) const { return _start[idx]; }
00172   char const &operator [] (int idx) const { return _start[idx]; }
00173   char const &operator [] (Index idx) const { return *idx; }
00174 
00175   bool eof(char const *s) const { return s >= _start + _len || !*s; }
00176 
00177   template<typename INT>
00178   int from_dec(INT *v) const
00179   {
00180     *v = 0;
00181     Index c;
00182     for (c = start(); !eof(c); ++c)
00183       {
00184   unsigned char n;
00185   if (*c >= '0' && *c <= '9')
00186     n = *c - '0';
00187   else
00188     return c - start();
00189 
00190         *v *= 10;
00191   *v += n;
00192       }
00193     return c - start();
00194   }
00195 
00196   template<typename INT>
00197   int from_hex(INT *v) const
00198   {
00199     *v = 0;
00200     unsigned shift = 0;
00201     Index c;
00202     for (c = start(); !eof(c); ++c)
00203       {
00204   shift += 4;
00205   if (shift > sizeof(INT) * 8)
00206     return -1;
00207   unsigned char n;
00208   if (*c >= '0' && *c <= '9')
00209     n = *c - '0';
00210   else if (*c >= 'A' && *c <= 'F')
00211     n = *c - 'A' + 10;
00212   else if (*c >= 'a' && *c <= 'f')
00213     n = *c - 'a' + 10;
00214   else
00215     return c - start();
00216 
00217         *v <<= 4;
00218   *v |= n;
00219       }
00220     return c - start();
00221   }
00222 
00223   bool operator == (String const &o) const
00224   {
00225     if (len() != o.len())
00226       return false;
00227 
00228     for (unsigned long i = 0; i < _len; ++i)
00229       if (_start[i] != o._start[i])
00230   return false;
00231 
00232     return true;
00233   }
00234 
00235   bool operator != (String const &o) const
00236   { return ! (operator == (o)); }
00237 
00238 private:
00239 
00240   char const *_start;
00241   unsigned long      _len;
00242 
00243 };
00244 
00245 }
00246 
00247 inline
00248 L4::BasicOStream &operator << (L4::BasicOStream &s, cxx::String const &str)
00249 {
00250   s.write(str.start(), str.len());
00251   return s;
00252 }
